website_summaries.verdict: Excellent collection of five different spices that range from bold to mild flavors.
pros: Very clear listing of the ingredients used in this set, so you can trust the quality
Variety of tastes that many people will love
Works equally well for grilling or smoking meats
cons: Small jars, so you're paying a high price per ounce of seasoning

customer_reviews.title: Helpful company/good spices
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad as a Christmas gift. When the package arrived one of the spices had broken. I reached out to the owner and he was wonderful about replacing the broken spice. He even sent two other spices for free with a hand written apology. My dad loves it and I will say that the spice that was broken upon arrival smelled great!
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully Prepared Packaging - Arrived in bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that likes tasty food, this is a must have! From soups to salads, these spices cover it all and can be used every single day. I keep a few bottles at my desk at work. Their size makes them perfect for transport and they fit in a spice rack perfectly! This is an already packaged gift, just ship it directly to a loved one, or friend. These spices would also make a great Memorial Day or Fathers Day gift ... How easy is that!!
customer_reviews.author: Exhibit-v

customer_reviews.title: MADE A GREAT GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend as a birthday gift because she loves spicy, she only uses organic, she is a foodie and she loves cooking. She loved this. I was impressed by the presentation. Didn't need wrapping, just put it in a gift bag. The next day she called and told me she made ghost pepper burgers and that they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: LatinTemptress

customer_reviews.title: Even my fussy teen loved it. Only a very light sprinkling of Fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: Wowza! I just had a dinner party and tried the Fresh Bay on Tilapia. It was a HUGE hit! The flavor was, hands down, the tastiest spice on fish I have ever tried. Even my fussy teen loved it. Only a very light sprinkling of Fresh Bay was needed to elicit big flavor and a beautiful bronze color so that little bottle will go a long way. Fabulous new find - I highly recommend! Can't wait to try the others!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dad who loves to grill
customer_reviews.text: Why are dads always the hardest to shop for? This wound up being a perfect gift for my grill master dad. The flavors are great, and the presentation is really sharp. My dad did cook a couple steaks in a cast iron skillet, and some of the herbs/spices burned, but I don't see that being an issue on a grill.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BBQ rubs
customer_reviews.text: I use my home smoker all the time, and have found this set of spices to be ideal. I can combine them in several ways to create the most delicious BBQ rubs. For example, I can take pork ribs and after removing the silverskin, spread yellow mustard on them and then shake a mixture of these spices over each side - then onto the smoker. Haven't tried to win a competition yet with them, but I bet that I could get close. Also - take any of them to a set of pork chops on your grill just as they start to brown up and you'll have the most delicious flavor and color added to them. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: jpmcdon

customer_reviews.title: All SO delicious
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed when I used these from the first time. Every seasoning has an awesome, unique flavor!! I'm already addicted to grill master and citrus pepper and I've been using them on EVERYTHING since I first opened them. Super delicious and really versatile-- just don't hesitate on this one!
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a great set of spices!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use these spice blends! They smell incredible and they were also packaged wonderfully for shipping! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these sets already. One for myself and one each for 3 of my adult nephews. They are wonderful to cook with and the variety is awesome. You don't even have to be an amateur chef to raise your food up several notches - just sprinkle it in and you are set to serve a tasty meal. I love that the company donates a portion of the purchase to feeding kids. A super gift, nicely packaged and much appreciated. I wish I could have waited till Christmas to give these out but I couldn't. However, if I would have discovered these in December, they certainly would have been given as Christmas gifts. They are that nice!
customer_reviews.author: Cris R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice presentation but all the flavors are lacking!
customer_reviews.text: As a long time griller in my mid 50s, this item looked awesome online. I purchased this back in Nov 2018 and finally had a chance to try all 5 spices included in the box set. I am extremely disappointed: These are basically colored salt. The salt overpowers any of the added flavors and spices in each flavor. Campfire Smokey Sea Salt has no smoke or campfire taste. The Smoked Cherrywood has a great smokey aroma but zero flavor other than salt. I can only suggest falling back to my favorite goto spices and rubs; McCormick's Grill Mates "Sweet & Smokey Rub". Weber's "Gourmet Burger" and Weber's "Roasted Garlic & Herb". Happy Grilling!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: I got these as more of a stocking stuffer for my husband he loves them. Well really the whole family loves them! We use them on our steaks and chicken on the grill and these really enhance the flavor. Would seriously recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Worst gift ever I will not buy this again Those are the two papers they rapid in that’s it 😒😒😒😒🙁😒😒😒😒😒 it was supposed to be a Christmas gift Only reason I put the star is because they will not allow you to write the review
customer_reviews.author: Nargas E

customer_reviews.title: OH Yes....love these little guys...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the cost. If you know about spices, this was a nice chance to try new and different taste to add to same old meats & foods....will order again. I also gave some for Xmas gifts...received well!
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking spices without sifter
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of the product is the same as shown. A successful gift for someone who likes to cook. However, none of the bottles comes with a sifter; making it difficult to control the quantity to be used.
customer_reviews.author: CYnthia Davila

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful variety to suit every palate!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smoked salt gift set for my brother as a birthday present. He loves to cook and is constantly experimenting with flavor and spice, oils and vinegars. He especially likes hot and smoky flavors so this should be right up his ally! I have not given it to him yet but Im confident that he will love it. Arrived quickly in perfect condtion, nicely packaged. And I loved that the JAX company reached out to me to make sure I received their product and I liked it so A+ on customer service! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor ordering system
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift twice. We purchased the smoke lover's set, which was enjoyed. The second time we ordered this we ended up with a different set than smoke lovers. It was a little disappointing and with the stress of the holidays we were unable to request an exchange. We recommend the product, but something is messed up with making sure you receive the set that was ordered.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer09

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set !!! We haven't had a chance to cook with these spices yet as we just received them yesterday, but we did open every bottle and taste the different seasonings. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors!
customer_reviews.text: I was curious to try these and am glad I did! The flavors are great and a little goes a long way. The spicy flavors aren't fooling around. They definitely provide a kick to your food. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Miluzzu

customer_reviews.title: Great taste quick and easy meals
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for mother for birthday. She loved the spices. The missing star is only because it was a bit pricey for the size of the spices.
customer_reviews.author: Bank of America

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father in law for Christmas and he LOVED it. He said if I gift this for him for every holiday he’d be content. He asked for the name and is planning on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Hairstylist11

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My father enjoyed these very much for his grilling; he says "because it is sold as a variety pack with individual containers", he can give any away that he does not particularly like
customer_reviews.author: Tristen

customer_reviews.title: Great salt free versions
customer_reviews.text: Love the peppered habanero. Sprinkle a little on my eggs. Fresh Bay is unique and put on chicken and veggies. I have relatives who have to reduce sodium. The salt free garlic herb is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: eric gibson

customer_reviews.title: Neat Gift Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as part of a gift for my dad - he's a big grilling man and loves to get new and different spices/rubs. The bottles appeared small, but was expected. The labeling was neat, and I like that they come from Florida and the different flavors and combinations that don't seem so "common." Over all I was happy with my purchase and I hope my dad will be too! Can't wait to go over and have him grill us something with these spices.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the guys in our family that love to bbq they were all very excited. The package was not the same as the picture but I honestly liked the one I got better. It was a little more manly and had the cutout so you could see the jars.
customer_reviews.author: Britain Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flavors for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of grilled food, however, I don't own a grill. The next best thing was to purchase smokey-flavored seasoning. I read a lot of good things about FreshJax and I like the fact that they are family owned and operated. I have tried several pairings with their seasonings and have enjoyed every meal so far. When my current supply of seasonings runs out, I plan on purchasing from FreshJax again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in New England

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves it! When you open the spices they smell strong but they do not taste that way once you use them. I love the packaging and the little glass bottles. The only thing I'm not a fan of is that they dont have plastic with the holes in it to shake it out. You have to pour it in your hand first and sprinkle in what you want. I will be ordering more flavors!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Beegle

customer_reviews.title: Great company to do business with
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a five season gift set for my spouse. He was delighted to received fun new spices for grilling. He only had one tiny issue about not having the plastic sprinkler holes on top. I reached out to the owner and he explained the circumstances and hand wrote me a letter with a nice gift for my troubles. I'm very happy he went out of his way to make it extra special. I would recommend buying spices from FreshJax! Customer service is EXCEPTIONAL! Thanks I'll be buying again from you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Allison M. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried all of these yet but the ones I have tried are awesome. My only take away would be that the bottles don't have shakers on them. However, other than that they are a great item.
customer_reviews.author: KarenKB

customer_reviews.title: Great barbecue taste
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for Father’s Day for my king of the barbecue husband! He loves smoke flavored spices and stated these are the best! They are fresh smelling and very tasteful. The looks to jars are also great. And then finding out that purchasing these products from this seller you are also helping to feed the hungry was a very nice bonus. Thank you so much and keep up the very good work.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I used these spices with my air fryer and even the "plain janes" of the group loved them. Amazing flavor, easy to use, great presentation. What makes it better is that it's family owned and operated. Supporting small business!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: All of their spices are flavorful. In the past I have always felt like spice mixes o order were missing something. No fresh jack. I love it. I have also “tricked” my husband into eating healthier. He loves the flavors and the variety. I started ordering directly from the company. The rosy cheeks and the citrus pepper are my favorite from this box set.
customer_reviews.author: Cat L

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my dad because he and his new wife love to grill. Cooking together every night is one of their favorite things to do. My dad absolutely loved it! It was packaged beautifully and it even says on the bottles what's in it and what they should put it on. It's a great gift for someone who loves to grill! I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: GRilling Spice Set
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled with this set. As it was a gift I didn't not want to review until it was used. I have to say my son was very pleased with this set !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A New Favorite At Our House!
customer_reviews.text: The spices in this set are a new favorite at out house. I had the spices for less than a week, and already used them several times. I used the citrus pepper with broiled asparagus, made a delicious soup for my husband with the peppered habanero, and added some of the smokey Southwest to a side of fried vegetables. YUM! Everything tasted DELICIOUS!!! I received a free spice set to review, but all opinions are mine and very honest.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Copaceanu

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, nice and neat packaging. They even threw in a little sample of another blended spice. Real tasty stuff, and it's organic too? Can't go wrong. Will continue buying their products for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: No one really liked it. Used Smokey on ribs and lime on chicken. Post oak wood for smoke. Usually use the rub from Rain Forest Cafe which gives you an idea of how our normal tastes run.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone cooking at home during this coronavirus time.
customer_reviews.text: As a gift, the recipient (my son) went well out of his way to thank me for the selection. The spices all were extremely fragrant and tasty when added to meals. He especially liked the aroma & flavor of the Cherrywood spice which is available as a separate item. Packaging seemed appropriate and useful for counter display.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G of Troy

customer_reviews.title: Small bottles, open lid
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Honestly, with the names of the spice blends I was expecting more. For the price I think there are better options out there. However, they would make a good gift. The bottles are A LOT smaller than I thought hand don't have any shaker cover on them. So if you open the lid be careful because it will all dump out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: The spices are super fresh, very aromatic, and you can tell as soon as you open them.
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this as a gift from our daughter. He grills our dinner at least four nights a week. The variety was nice and the spices were really fresh.. The bottles are small but there is plenty in each bottle for several uses and my husband uses spice liberally! we have already reordered the Island Spice, Bold Bayou and Citrus Pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4Russ

customer_reviews.title: Very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Just started using a pellet smoker and want to get better flavor from my meats. Have used three of the 5 and they have all been very good and added that zip of flavor I was looking for. Just used the burger one today and it was great. Love the fact that they gift a box when you purchase one. Will try their others as well.
customer_reviews.author: William Erario

customer_reviews.title: he has throughly enjoyed them. They’re a little smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad for Father’s Day, he has throughly enjoyed them. They’re a little smaller than I anticipated, but I hadn’t exactly read the description before hand, so that’s my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Coppotelli

customer_reviews.title: Great cause, quality, & price!!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is AMAZING 👏 I love what they stand for and the packing was well thought out and very cool. My dad loves the spices and I'll definitely buy more product in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my hubby
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tasted these yet so my review is based solely on presentation... but this is a perfect gift! My husband is quite the griller/smoker/meat preparer and I KNOW he will love these. The box came perfectly presentable & packaged nicely- a perfect Christmas gift! I can't wait to have him try these out.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: ... my dad for fathers day and he was so happy to receive it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dad for fathers day and he was so happy to receive it! This product comes with a range of wonderful flavors of spices for both people who love the spicy things in life AND the sweeter things in life. I would buy this product again, this time for myself though because I loved the product so much.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Spices and Father’s Day ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I got these spices for my hubby and we are using them today for Father’s Day!! We are very excited and will update soon!! My only complaint so far would be they aren’t in a shaker form :( and we used half of a bottle just for chicken drumsticks...I will update soon with flavor!! It does smell good though!!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: But this! It will change your bbq life.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love!!! I thought I would only like two maybe three... oh man, both my husband and I absolutely love each one! Especially the island one! Sweet and spicy, prefect on bbq chicken. We will definitely buy again and try other flavors! Keep up the great work! We love supporting small businesses too.
customer_reviews.author: CindyRo

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that these spices were made in Jax. We raised our kids there. The hamburger seasoning was yummy. Great flavor. Can't wait to use the other flavors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-a-rino

customer_reviews.title: Best seasoning blends EVER! Tastebud orgasming flavors! You DESERVE these flavors!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST SEASONING I'VE EVER TASTED! Ordered in June, already used most of the 5-pack & ordered another 5 larger bottles. Everyone I've reccomend FreshJax to absolutely LOVES the seasonings! I've found the seasonings I'll use for the rest of my life. Seriously, every cook NEEDS these amazing, hand crafted flavors. Cannot reccomend enough! After years of amazon prime, this is my first review. This small family business truly nailed flavors everyone will love! Do yourself & your meals a huge favor with the delicious & tastebud orgasmic flavors! Truly a deal 5 for $25...I'd gladly pay double for these seasonings. You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri & Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this set enough that I gifted it to my father in law. The smoky sea salt flavor was particularly good. My only tiny complaint was that the mouths of the jars were small so i couldn’t use my spice measuring spoons, but the spices are good so a little goes a long way anyway
customer_reviews.author: Brady Burr

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We got these as stocking stuffer for all the grown sons who love to cook. The early feedback from the brisket smoker in Sinking Spring, he reports they are so good he's ordering more for his buddies. I'm ordering some for ME and some of my pals who like to grill.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Higgins

customer_reviews.title: The only Bay seasoning I've ever liked
customer_reviews.text: These are great spices, and I love the Bay seasoning they have on salmon cooked medium. I put a 90% ratio of the Bay with a 10% blend of the pepper one for kick. I'm on my second batch of these spices. Also, the southwest one is about as authentic as it comes.
customer_reviews.author: Darrelltwo

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for the grill person in your life. The spice set had a wonderful selection of spices. And it was already boxed ready to be given as a gift. I wish that Amazon placed this in another box though. It was a gift and it came delivered in its original box. The person that was getting it as a gift saw it. Nothing Freshjax did. This was Amazon packaging. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious variety pack and visually appealing packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. All the flavors were amazing. The only drawback is it gets stuck in the bottle a bit since I purchased the salt pack. The packaging was very nice and looked great if it was going to be given as a gift. Ashes wonderful and I use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cass24

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for a a neighbor's birthday. It came in a nice box and he opened it and we all did taste tests. The neat thing is that the appropriate foods for the seasoning are listed on the label. Great size - not too big but big enough!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy grilling so I was excited to see this offered. However, each jar of spice was overpowered by salt. In some cases you could barely make out the spice.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Tyo

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Simply love these spices. Thinking of buying the super pack of all of their spices because they are so good and flavorful. A very satisfied and new repeat customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of spices. Gave as a gift and they said they liked it- came packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia T

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father’s Day gift for my husband. Makes a very nice gift for the griller in the family. He was very pleased with the variety of spices and looking forward to trying them out. I love the fact that it’s family run and they donate a meal for each item purchased.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hennings

customer_reviews.title: Flavor enhancers on point
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is the cook so I got him the seasonings as part of a bday gift. So far everything he has made with them has been A+ I will def order more!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Culbert

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of my husband’s Father’s Day gift as he recently got a new grill and is obsessed with it. These spices taste FANTASTIC!! Even my six year old son, the pickiest eater on the entire planet, devoured tilapia that was seasoned with one of these. We’ve used these spices on burgers, squash (use the Campfire one—oh wow—so so good), fish, chicken breasts, chicken thighs and asparagus. I’ve even used these spices on foods I’ve cooked in the air fryer and they’re equally delicious. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: I did a picnic basket for father's day this year. Meat and grill accessories and the like. I ordered this on a whim and it's the most talked about item in my dad's basket. He really liked the variety and he loved the fact that a meal is donated per package. I will be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: amanda young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Options!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and so far they tell me the flavor is great. I picked the 5pc variation set because it has so many options for someone who likes to cook and doesn't always use the same flavor profile over and over. The set came in a nicely packaged box of its own inside of the Amazon box so it was easy to wrap up and give. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MegS

customer_reviews.title: Honestly disappointed with the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for father's day a while back We have barely used them. The flavors really are not very good. My dad loves to grill, but I wouldn't suggest these spices. Kind of just ruins meat unless you want a strange fake-smokey style taste
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother in law and he loves it. All the flavors taste great but his favorite one is the jerk seasoning. Came in cute enough packaging to make it a great gift rather then a bunch of random containers of seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Rose W.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Experience!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing what can be done with sea salt! My favorite is the Grill Master seasoning. Oh, my gosh! I want to order a big bottle of this. They also included a sample of brunch seasoning that I need to have more of. I will definitely be reordering soon!
customer_reviews.author: Fatimah Najieb

customer_reviews.title: A gift worth giving!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for dirty Santa events in hopes I would win one for myself- I didn’t. They were such a hit everyone loved them. And the people who tried have additionally purchased others
customer_reviews.author: Emily Prince

customer_reviews.title: Not all that..
customer_reviews.text: This was a quick by for a birthday. I should have looked closer and realized the this is just flavored salt with a little seasoning in it. I'm not saying it was horrible or even bad but I definitely wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my parents- my dad specifically. But both parents love it! My mother ripped through the habanero pepper and my dad uses the burger spice and grill seasoning consistently. I’m actually ordering a large container of the habanero for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kip W.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. I use them for every meal I ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I use them for every meal I prepare. And the one that I didn't think I was going to like (Campfire) turned out to be my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this set when I was searching for nice spices so I went with it - they are delicious! I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend because he enjoys grilling. The Peppered Habanero is my favorite!! It has wonderful flavor.
customer_reviews.author: ConStarTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT , GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my husband he loves grilling and smoking all types of food & he absolutely loved it ! Such a great gift for men to like to cook can’t wait to try them ! We love that it’s pure seasonings no fillers or extra chemicals all organic ! Such a great gift box he said he will be buying more flavors from them
customer_reviews.author: marisol galvan

customer_reviews.title: Too Salty
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy very hot spices . I somewhat liked the set but there is too much salt and not enough just plain hot spices in this set , way too salty .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a present for the person who has everything they need. This is the gift for them. We received this set last tear and love each and every one of them. Perfect whether you’re a grilled or not. This will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hand

customer_reviews.title: Salt, pepper, spice get it at your table
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Great for adding a little spice on your plate. Would not recommend for cooking. More useful as an addition to the table like your salt and pepper shaker. Won’t recommend for cooks unless it’s for your single person meal
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father-in-law as a gift and he loved them! He loves to grill so the first time he used this product was on ribs! Forget which particular seasoning he used but it was a dry rub and delicious! Also feels good to know this is a good company and the ingredients are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Naula

customer_reviews.title: Unique and tasty spices
customer_reviews.text: So far we have tried the Alderwood Smoked Sea Salt, Grill Master and Smokey Southwest. The Alderwood Smoked Sea Salt smelled very strong, but the flavor itself was very subtle when added to steaks that we cooked. We are used to using Montreal steak seasoning, but we have gotten bored with it and each of these smoked spices have added new flavor and variety to our steaks and chicken. Our favorite so far has been the smokey southwest. I would choose any of these over typical grocery store offerings that we had been using. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter's bf who lives out of state so I never got to try, unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Needs spiced up
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little package, but none of the blends are any better than what you can achieve with some pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and paprika. I’m added them to that blend for a little extra, but still did not notice any added flavor.
customer_reviews.author: kking52

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband, happy wife.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is super hard to buy for so got him this as a gift. He loves grilling and smoking meats and was very pleased to get this set. After sampling some of the food he's seasoned with it I'm really glad I found it. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina McRaney

customer_reviews.title: Very salty
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, i used it and did not realize that it would be that salty and I had to rinse down my meat and vegetables because all i tasted was the salt no flavor. I bought this for a friend and she said the same thing. We will use it in a soup base to see if that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice thank-you gift for a guy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a thank-you gift for my brother-in-law who enjoys cooking and grilling, so I can’t address the flavor. The descriptions of the flavors made my mouth water though. Bro was thrilled to get it and is anticipating the spring thaw in Michigan, so the grilling can begin.
customer_reviews.author: Kayt Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice flavors, fresh and everything. But, there's no sprinkler/grater cap to these, so it just pours out too much. I don't like that and I'm going to have to rehouse the spices. Not for me, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wes patton

customer_reviews.title: Great variety....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who loves spicy flavor. He loved it and uses them on everything!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift filled with flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spice set that makes a wonderful gift. All the spices in this set taste great and add so much flavor without all the additives in some other spice brands. The packaging is nice as well and makes you feel good giving to someone as a good as it gives back to fight hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Laurakp05

customer_reviews.title: Simple gift for the BBQ lover
customer_reviews.text: Makes a nice little gift. Picked this up for Dad for Christmas. Spice blends are a little smaller than expected, but they come in heavy glass bottles & they look great. Quality gift. I'd buy it again for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and yummy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome presentation, yummy flavors. I probably wouldn't buy it again only because I tend to like my own seasoning mixes better. I keep trying new ones and still suggest this one too, especially a gift. The freshness and quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love the ghost pepper sea salt. It replaced the one i love from hawaii as that shipping was costly! I’ll definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with our purchase. My husband loves to cook so I got him these for Christmas. I liked that they are from a small company in my family’s hometown. My husband loves all of the spices. A small amount goes a long way. Cute packaging and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Hawke

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: These came in a nice box and they shipped well. I used them as a stocking stuffer and they look amazing. The variety is awesome and loved how quickly they shipped. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mangano

customer_reviews.title: Awwwwwwesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff - this salt is awesome on anything you use it on!! Can't believe how versatile it is and how it flavors your food! Will darn sure purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: pr

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Flavorings
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice flavors. I used Grill Master on a steak and it was so good! Just watch out because there is no shaker top, so you can accidentally dump out way too much. The packaging is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Darshay

customer_reviews.title: Smoker spice substitute ya
customer_reviews.text: Loved this gift to go in our smoker lovin’ man basket for husbands birthday! The southwest spice is off the hook! Spice is loose and does not come with a shaker cap but doesn’t need it as a rub anywho! Great taste and has a delicate smoke flavor that doesn’t over power or taste synthetic All around great spice
customer_reviews.author: Rick Campisi

customer_reviews.title: They are all great and the its hard to pick a favorite between ...
customer_reviews.text: They are all great and the its hard to pick a favorite between the Grill Master & Mesquite lime. I recommend them as a great gift for anyone that cooks. Grill Master is a excellent burger seasoning
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got this twice now, very good and so glad there’s a set of organic spices out there, very good variety great gift for men
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Spices!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this spice collection. We love these spices, used them on so many things, chicken, fish, beef. Great flavors in in each different bottle. Love it, if you grill a lot like we do, you need these spices.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: good product! I like what they stand for, but with that being said; it’s expensive for what you get.. the bottles are tiny and you have to use a lot to get any flavor. I mean for a cheaper price, I’d deff recommend but not for what they currently cost
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spices!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. I loved them all But the habanero and garlic was off The charted good. I put it on my chicken and roasted it. Absolutely Fabulous . Just yummy good and the heat Was just right. Keep doing what your Doing. I know I’ll be back for more!!👍👍👍❤️
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline H fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used all in the pack as of yet but loved the peppered habanero with chicken. Made a fajita combo that was amazing w just the right amount of spice. Looking forward to trying the others. Ease of ordering and prompt delivery was great, I've given a few sets as gifts with rave reviews. A winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bochinski

customer_reviews.title: Great spice set!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great spices. They have a very fresh smell and flavor. We are enjoying using them all!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota122503

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tasting Spices
customer_reviews.text: Excellent variety of tasty spices. Bought a set for myself and a Keto set for a friend. Will purchase in a few days the Grilling set for our son who loves to grill. Excellent blends. Need only a pinch and no other seasoning for awesome taste. Will try other blends also. Super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: FreshJax Grilling Spice Gift Set, (Set of 5)
feature_bullets: 🌿 MAKE LIFE EASIER- You'll want to clean out your grandma's expired spice bottle collection after trying these blends. One FreshJax blend for one recipe is all you need. FEATURED SPICES- PEPPERED HABANERO adds hot flavor to steak, kabobs, and wings. FRESH BAY is divine on all your seafood favorites. GRILL MASTER is tasty on burgers, veggies, and kabobs. SMOKEY SOUTHWEST brings Tex-Mex flavor to chicken and corn on the cob. CITRUS PEPPER is delicious on fish, chicken, and your favorite veggies.

🎁 TASTY GRILL LOVERS GIFT- This present will create many wonderful memories. Imagine this, you walk outside to smiling faces with air filled of delicious flavor and contagious laughter as the food hits the grill. Gift these artisanal spice blends for Christmas, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, wedding gift and favors, housewarming parties, and any event where delicious food is a priority.

🧒🏾 FIGHTING CHILDHOOD HUNGER - 1 in 6 children in America don't know when their next meal will be, but your purchase helps to change that. So far, the FreshJax Campaign To End Childhood Hunger has supplied over 166,000 meals to hungry children in need.
✅ CERTIFIED ORGANIC by Americert International, CERTIFIED KOSHER by Gesher K, Gluten-free, Non-GMO, Non-Irradiated, No Artificial Flavors.

💚 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – FreshJax is a SMALL FAMILY BUSINESS handcrafting your favorite organic spices since 2011. Love these spices even more than we love to make them, or you'll get your money back.
